name: Time Stone (kfischer_okarin, pixelaim)
description:
A prototype about a forest girl trying to save the burning forest.

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Walk
Space: Jump
Hold E: Start aiming Time Field (Aim with arrow keys while holding E)
Release E:  Shoot time field. Press E again to set up the time field which will slow down everything. Press E another time to remove the time field again

Credits Art:

All art except time field and crosshair by pixelaim

BGM:

Leaving Home by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4708-leaving-home

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
